programme.title: Streetwise
programme.desc: Audi set new standards with their RS5 Coupe. Also: the Erzberg Rodeo is one of the toughest enduro races in the world. We show highlights from the 2012 event. And: the Suzuki Kizashi 4x4 and the Mercedes-Benz GL.

programme.title: Streetwise
programme.desc: The Ariel Atom is a street-legal sports car that provides ultimate acceleration and maximum cornering speed. Also: the third-generation Audi A3 on the roads of Mallorca. And: the Mini John Cooper Works Roadster and the fifth-generation Chevrolet Camaro.

programme.title: Streetwise
programme.desc: With the GT86, Toyota want to create a sports car that builds upon the glory days of the company's success model Celica. Also: Audi TT RS vs. Mercedes-AMG SLK 55. And: the Techart GT Street R, a souped-up Porsche 911 Turbo.

programme.title: Streetwise
programme.desc: Peugeot introduced an updated version of their 208 success model, and there is also a rally version named R2. Also: how far can to go in a Volkswagen Polo BlueGT? And: the Freestyle Festival Swatch Free4Style.

programme.title: Streetwise
programme.desc: Nissan's and Datsun's Z model range of cars is for the Japanese what the Porsche 911 is for Germans. Also: the Porsche Cup 2011 at Nürburgring. And: Audi A7 vs. Mercedes-Benz CLS 350.

programme.title: Lamborghini Huracan by O.CT
programme.desc: A lot of power thanks to a compressor. This optimized O.CT Lamborghini Huracán delivers over 800 horse power to get the blood flowing.

programme.title: Rimac Concept One
programme.desc: The futuristically designed Rimac Concept One is one of the fastest, most powerful and expensive electric cars in the world, it does not adhere to convention.

programme.title: Jaguar XJR
programme.desc: The highlight of the XJR lies beneath the hood: all of Jaguar's top models are equipped with the 5-liter V8 compressor engine that delivers 550 HP in this sports sedan.

programme.title: Dreamcars
programme.desc: Italian super sports cars like the Ferrari La Ferrari, the Lamborghini Aventador or the Pagani Huayra are the most beautiful and fastest cars in the world, created by the best designers. Italian super sports cars are dreams made reality.

programme.title: Dreamcars
programme.desc: British super sports cars like the Aston Martin Vanquish, the Bentley Continental GT Speed or McLaren's P1 are among the most spectacular and beautiful sports cars in the world. It's not just about power but also grace and style.

programme.title: Dreamcars
programme.desc: Whether it is the Porsche 918 Spyder, the Audi R8, the Mercedes AMG GT or the BMW i8 - German super sports cars are the fastest and most coveted in the world, with their breathtaking top speeds and incredible engine power.

programme.title: Dreamcars
programme.desc: The super sports cars by Ferrari, Lamborghini, McLaren, Pagani and Porsche are like Formula One racing cars for the streets, the fastest and most exciting cars in the world, whose power and performance seem to defy the laws of physics.

programme.title: Dreamcars
programme.desc: Ferrari 250 GTO, Porsche 911, Aston Martin DB 5 or Lamborghini Aventador and Ferrari LaFerrari - every era produces fabulous dream cars, born from the fascination for breathtaking design and the dream for outstanding speed.

programme.title: Porsche Cayman GT4
programme.desc: The Porsche Cayman GT4. Lighter, more powerful and faster than ever. Porsche shows what is possible with this vehicle, when fast lap times are in the focus of attention.

programme.title: Porsche Techart Grand GT
programme.desc: The Techart Grand GT may look like Darth Vader's private ride, but it's in fact a souped-up version of the Porsche Panamera.

programme.title: Tuning
programme.desc: The IAA in Frankfurt is the largest motor show in the world. More than 900 exhibitors present their new products in 11 halls and on 14 outdoor areas. Here you can marvel at tomorrow's trends today.

programme.title: Tuning
programme.desc: The tuning forge SKN from Benstorf is organising a Dyno Day for the second time. Also: Lorinser refines the Mercedes E 500 Coupé. And: an invitation to Raeder Motorsport.

programme.title: Tuning
programme.desc: Patrick Simon tests the Aston Martin Zagato on the Grand Prix circuit. Also: Renault Megane Sport vs. Golf GTI Edition 35. And: the Porsche 997 and 994 on the Nordschleife.

programme.title: Tuning
programme.desc: Once a year, Las Vegas hosts the largest car and tuning trade show in the world - the SEMA Show. We show the highlights from hot rods to custom cars.

programme.title: Tuning
programme.desc: The car tuner Lorinser looks back on more than 30 years of experience in tuning Mercedes Benz cars. Also: aeroplane vs. Porsche GT3. And: in an Aston Martin on the Nordschleife.

programme.title: Tuning
programme.desc: The Essen Motor Show is the event for automobile and motor sports enthusiasts. Over 300,000 visitors flock here every year and bring the hallowed halls to a boil.

programme.title: Porsche Ruf RT35
programme.desc: Ruf RT35 may look like a Porsche, but it really isn't. Since 1981, the Ruf company in Pfaffhausen, Germany, has been recognized as an independent manufacturer. But the basis for its vehicles comes exclusively from Porsche. A Ruf is even faster and more exclusive than a comparable Porsche.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: GT, those two letters stand for vehicles that combine sportiness with long-distance comfort. One of the most beautiful models of this category is the Maserati Gran Turismo S. With the 570GT, English sports car manufacturer McLaren introduced its first grand tourer. It was supposed to be the most comfortable and most suitable McLaren for long distances, while still retaining its sports car genes.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: Mercedes launches a new cabriolet offensive. For the first time ever, the C class is available as open-top models. The C43 AMG acts as the entry-level model to the Mercedes-AMG cabriolet world. With the 718 Boxster, Porsche offers a convertible at a competitive price as well. The S model Porsche’s characteristic sporty setup make for the perfect open-air feeling.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: With the Bentayga, Bentley introduced the first SUV in the brand's 100-year history. It features the finest materials and an impressive V12 engine. Range Rover, however, took a different approach with the Evoque Cabriolet. The iconic manufacturer combined two things that usually don't really fit together: they offered a convertible option for their SUV model. And: the Mercedes AMG GLE coupe.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: Porsche's 911 Turbo S Cabriolet is a timelessly elegant all-rounder and nevertheless more of a cruiser than a sports vehicle. Still, it's one of the most performance-oriented convertibles in the world. In direct contrast, the Rolls Royce Dawn provides luxury and elegance at a new level. This exclusive convertible opened a new chapter in the success story of Rolls Royce.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: Aston Martin’s DB series bears the initials of David Brown, the man who after the Second World War brought new glory to the British brand. With their new DB 11, Aston Martin heads towards the future at full throttle. Also: after its facelift the Nissan GTR presented itself freshly streamlined and more powerful than ever. And: Lamborghini's V10 fighting bull, the Huracán.

programme.title: Audi R8 V10 plus
programme.desc: The second generation of the Audi R8. V10 naturally aspirated engine, up to 610 horsepower and 330 kilometers an hour. A supercar with a lot of character.

programme.title: Cadillac Escalade
programme.desc: The Cadillac Escalade at first seems like a typical rather beefy American car, but this luxurious SUV is more of a lovable, gentle giant, that should be able to gain sympathy with its clientele.

programme.title: Dreamcars
programme.desc: British limousines are the embodiment of luxury, they are the automotive upper class. Built with the most exclusive materials, these limousines like the Rolls Royce Phantom, Bentley Mulsanne or Jaguar XJ combine luxury, comfort and power.

programme.title: Dreamcars
programme.desc: Whether it is the Mercedes S-Class, the BMW 7-series or the Audi A8, limousines "Made in Germany" are considered status symbols, setting standards when it comes to comfort, pioneering technologies and safety.

programme.title: Dreamcars
programme.desc: International limousines by Rolls Royce, Bentley, Mercedes, BMW and Jaguar guarantee an exclusive appearance and stand for status, prestige and perfection. They are the benchmark when it comes to luxury and comfort.

programme.title: Dreamcars
programme.desc: Power limousines like the BMW M5, Mercedes-AMG E63, Audi RS6 and Mulsanne Speed offer a unique mix of style, performance and suitability for daily use. They combine the luxury of a limousine with the dynamics of a super sports car.

programme.title: Dreamcars
programme.desc: They are masterpieces of automotive art, cars of breathtaking elegance, extraordinary performance, built for speeds beyond imagination: Bugatti Chiron, Lykan Hypersports, Pagani Huayra and Ferrari LaFerrari.

programme.title: BMW Kelleners Sport 640i Grand Coupe
programme.desc: The Kelleners Sport 640i is based on one of the most beautiful 4-door coupes. The tuning company of Ralf Kelleners, the son of a three-time European touring car champion, made a name for itself by specializing in remodeling BMWs.

programme.title: Volkswagen Touareg V6 TDI
programme.desc: Volkswagen subjected the Touareg to a radical makeover. After the end of the Phaeton, it's the new luxury top model from VW. Hopes are high: it has to sell big so that management can restore the peoples' confidence in the Volkswagen brand.

programme.title: Ignition GT
programme.desc: Ernest gets behind the wheel of the GWM P300. BYD’s Shark 6 prepares to take a bite out of the bakkie segment and Zee finds out how the Ford Ranger makes towing stress-free.

programme.title: Buyer's Guide
programme.desc: We find the perfect sporty vehicle for a 22-year-old. We go in search of a SUV suited for towing and we discuss the long-term ownership prospects of a VW Polo.

programme.title: Garage Gold
programme.desc: We’re in Johannesburg for the annual Angela’s Picnic. Mmasea meets up with the ultimate American muscle car aficionado. And we have two iconic BMWs going head to head in our Garage Gold Concourse Competition.

programme.title: Petrolheads
programme.desc: We meet a group of passionate BMW owners at Car Candy Inc. We find out more about the first wireless dyno in South Africa. A very special Renault Megane climbs its way up the Drag Kings leader board and we meet a band of legendary local racing heroes.

programme.title: Porsche Ruf RT35
programme.desc: Ruf RT35 may look like a Porsche, but it really isn't. Since 1981, the Ruf company in Pfaffhausen, Germany, has been recognized as an independent manufacturer. But the basis for its vehicles comes exclusively from Porsche. A Ruf is even faster and more exclusive than a comparable Porsche.

programme.title: FIA European Truck Racing Championship
programme.desc: The 2024 season of the European Truck Racing Championship kicks off in Misano, Italy, with new tyres and two new driver categories.

programme.title: FIA European Truck Racing Championship
programme.desc: The teams and drivers head to the south-western part of Slovakia in order to prove their expertise near Bratislava at the Automotodróm Slovakia Ring.

programme.title: FIA European Truck Racing Championship
programme.desc: It's off to Belgium for Round 3 of the 2024 European Truck Racing Championship at the circuit of Zolder.

programme.title: FIA European Truck Racing Championship
programme.desc: The fourth round of the ETRC's 2024 season is the International ADAC Truck Grand Prix at the Nürburgring.

programme.title: FIA European Truck Racing Championship
programme.desc: The Autodrom Most in the Czech Republic hosts Round 5 of the 2024 season of the European Truck Racing Championship.

programme.title: FIA European Truck Racing Championship
programme.desc: For the sixth round of the 2024 season of the ETRC, the teams and drivers gather in Le Mans, France.

programme.title: FIA European Truck Racing Championship
programme.desc: The Circuito del Jarama in Spain is the location of Round 7 of the 2024 season of this exciting truck racing competition.

programme.title: Toyota GT86 J-Sport
programme.desc: With the Toyota GT 86 from J-Sport, it is noticeable that the company's roots lie in racing. The fans' wish to give the Japanese racer significantly more power nevertheless remained unfulfilled.

programme.title: Jaguar XJR
programme.desc: The highlight of the XJR lies beneath the hood: all of Jaguar's top models are equipped with the 5-liter V8 compressor engine that delivers 550 HP in this sports sedan.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.sub-title: Lykan HyperSport - The Making of a Supercar
programme.desc: Ralph R. Debbas had the dream to build the ultimate super car and the first one developed in the Arabic world. He brought together a financier from Beirut, engineers and designers from Turin and engine specialists from Germany to create the Lykan HyperSport. Supercars follows the making of a super car from the first design experiments to its unveiling at the Doha Motor Show.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: The BMW M6 Gran Coupé is the latest SUV from Munich combining the best of luxury, power, design and comfort.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: The Wiesmann MF5 Roadster, the Audi R8 V10 Spyder and the Ruf RT 35 are real Bavarian fellows but faster than every Weisswurst and beer.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.sub-title: Million-Dollar Toys from the Middle East
programme.desc: They are sleek, they are exclusive and most of all: they are extremely fast - supercars! See the first Arabian supercar and many other brand new luxury sport cars from the Qatar Motor Show.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: Maybach Exelero: A car directly from Gotham City! Truely one of a kind with 700 horesepower and 350 km/h max.

programme.title: The Dubai Police Force's Special Cars Unit
programme.desc: For the first time the Dubai Police special cars unit allows a TV crew to accompany their officers on patrol. These aren't normal police cars because this is not a normal city.

programme.title: DKW F12 Roadster
programme.desc: More than 60 years ago, the managers and workers from Ingolstadt, Germany, presented the last car manufactured under the brand name DKW, the F12 Roadster.

programme.title: Motorvision Specials
programme.desc: Every other year, the Land Rover Experience Tour invites adventurers to explore the world's most remote areas. In 2017, the destination was Peru. Part 1 of 4.
